headline: Why AppLovin (APP) Might be Well Poised for a Surge
summary: AppLovin (APP) shares have started gaining and might continue moving higher in the near term, as indicated by solid earnings estimate revisions.

headline: Insider-Owned Growth Companies To Watch In May 2025
summary: Over the last 7 days, the United States market has experienced a 3.9% rise, contributing to a 12% increase over the past year, with earnings projected to grow by 14% annually. In this favorable environment, stocks of growth companies with high insider ownership can be particularly appealing as they often indicate confidence from those closest to the business and potential for continued expansion.

headline: 2 Growth Stocks to Add to Your Roster and 1 to Question
summary: Growth boosts valuation multiples, but it doesn’t always last forever. Companies that cannot maintain it are often penalized with large declines in market value, a lesson ingrained in investors who lost money in tech stocks during 2022.

raw.headline: 2 Growth Stocks to Add to Your Roster and 1 to Question
